topic.title: Failed to Run Pipeline: The entity cannot not be resolved through catalogs

body.p: You can get error messages like:
body.codeblock: Failed to run pipeline: The entity SOME_ENTITY cannot not be resolved through catalogs. For security reasons files that are not listed in the DITA-OT catalogs and are not located in the DITA-OT directory are not read
body.p: when the security checks implemented in the default transformation have blocked the reading of files that are not part of the DITA-OT (Oxygen Publishing Engine) installation directory, and are not part of the transformed DITA map.
You can disable these checks if the origin of the transformed content is known and trusted, by setting the transformation parameter args.disable.security.checks to yes.
